topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 1.0: Development Platform Commercial 1.01 Update

body.p: The HPE Helion Development Platform currently contains four products: Application Lifecycle Service (ALS), Marketplace Service, Messaging Service and Database Service.
The following sections explain how to update the HPE Helion Development Platform.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: The following guide outlines the steps to update HPE Helion Development Platform from version 1.0 to 1.01. Before executing these steps, ensure you have upgraded HPE Helion OpenStack to 1.01 as described in the HPE Helion OpenStack Update Overview.
Note: If you created a new installation of 1.01, bypassing 1.0, you need to install HPE Helion OpenStack Development Platform Services, and not update. See Development Platform Install Guide.

section.title: Update the Messaging Service
section.p: This section provides details on updating the Messaging Service for Helion OpenStack Development Platform. This assumes that the Messaging Service is installed in your cloud.
Note: If the Message Service is not installed, see the Helion OpenStack

li.p: Click on the Admin panel and select Development Platform. Then, click Configure Services.
Locate the Messaging Service item in the Configure Services table and select Download Service and wait for the download to complete.
Once the download is complete, the new image for Messaging clusters will be available. All clusters created from this point forward will be using the Messaging Service 1.01 version.

section.title: Update the Application Lifecycle Service (ALS)
section.p: This section provides details on updating the Application Lifestyle service (ALS) for Helion OpenStack Development Platform. This assumes that (ALS) is installed in your cloud.
Note: If the Message Service is not installed, see the Helion OpenStack Development Platform Install Guide.
The process for updating ALS requires you to remove then have asked that you remove the current version then installing ALS 1.01.

section.title: Remove Application Lifecycle Service 1.0

li.p: In the Projects Images panel locate the Application Lifecycle Service images.

section.p: The ALS images are deleted and the service has been removed.

section.title: Download the Application Lifecycle Service 1.01
section.p: To download the latest version of ALS:

li.p: In the Configure Services panel locate the Application Lifecycle Service item in the Configure Services table and select Download Service and wait for the download to complete.

Once the download is complete, the new image for Application Lifecycle Service clusters will be available. All clusters created from this point forward will be using the Application Lifecycle Service 1.01 version.

section.title: Update the Database Service
section.p: This section provides details on updating the Database Service for Helion OpenStack Development Platform. This assumes that the Database service is installed in your cloud.
Note: If the Database service is not installed, see the Development Platform Installation.

section.title: Download the Database Service
section.p: To download the latest version of the Database service:

li.p: In the Configure Services panel locate the Database Service item in the Configure Services table and select Download Service and wait for the download to complete.
Once the download is complete, the new images for Database Service will be available. If at any point, you choose to rebuild the Database Service control plane, it will use the latest images.

section.title: Update the Marketplace Service
section.p: This section provides details on updating the Marketplace service for the HPE Helion OpenStack Development Platform. This assumes that the Marketplace service is installed in your cloud.
Note: If the Marketplace service is not installed, see the Helion OpenStack Development Platform Install Guide.

li.p: In the Configure Services panel locate the Marketplace Service item in the Configure Services table and select Download Service and wait for the download to complete.
Once the download is complete, the new images for Marketplace Service will be available. If at any point, you choose to rebuild the Marketplace Service control plane, it will use the latest images.

section.title: Service is stuck in download
section.p: There are several situations in which a download will not complete. One cause which is documented, is because the tmp directory ran out of space. There is a prerequisite to mount the tmp directory to a larger partition. If you have completed this and it is still failing to download then we will need to reset the download. In the current release, this requires a manual process.

As the "admin" user, in the "admin" tenant, click on Project, then Object Store. Open the "sherpa-cache" folder and delete the wscatalog.<id> folder which contains the cached download. The service should now be available to download again.
